message:
For the people inside Egypt
I'm frustrated with all of the VPN service providers
It's always unstable or not working at all
I tried a lot of companie
I need to know based on YOUR OWN experience which one works with you the best
I know that VPN here is somehow being throttled or being screwed with, so that's why I'm asking for your own personal experience
I tried:

1. FrootVPN
2. CactusVPN
3. PrivateInternetAccess
4. AirVPN

So a little help please ?

data.message: I'm using unlimitedvpn which is nice till now.

hide.me 
been using it for months now with online games and it works as expected :)
U can build your own using something like digital ocean for 5$/month

buy your own VPS and create a VPN server

it allows you to use netflix aswell even after the new proxy detection ;)

Get a free linux server on Amazon EC2 and build your own VPN. Or at least use SSH tunnel if you want to access something specific. There is a great Firefox addon called FoxyProxy which allows you to configure custom proxies based on the hostname or ip address or any wildcard.

Personally I setup an IPSEC VPN from my TPLink router to another Cisco firewall in the US. I "assume" you could have a software IPsec in linux and set that up on Amazon.
TigerVPN is working really good with me https://www.tigervpn.com

If it's just a browsing matter, then these two fit:
ZenMate extension for Chrome Or Browsec, total experience with both 4 years at least, they are stable no ads and work with high speed
ZenMate been using it for a year now

Zenmate & Hide.me are the best till now with me. Try them for free before purchasing to make sure that it suits you 　
- Zenmate gives you 7 Day's Free Trial.
- Hide.me gives you 2 GB download ( if you used them in your first 10 minutes, your trial is completed ) and you can also save them for more than 7 days if you don't use it much 　
- Zenmate gives you more regions in your free trial, France & Luxembourg is the best for you ( I tried all of them ).
- Hide.me gives you Netherlands & Canada & Singapore only in your free 2 GB, Netherlands is the best for you.
Hope you find this information useful for you, Good Luck ;)
